trans-unit.source: Baseline content alignment — specifying a baseline alignment value for justify-content or align-content — works in layout methods that lay items out in rows. The alignment subjects are baseline aligned against each other by adding padding inside the boxes.
trans-unit.target: 基线内容对齐（为 justify-content 或 align-content 指定基线对齐值）在将项目按行布局的布局方法中有效。通过在框内添加填充，可以使对齐主题的基线彼此对齐。

trans-unit.source: Baseline self alignment shifts the boxes to align by baseline by adding a margin outside the boxes. Self alignment is when using justify-self or align-self, or when setting these values as a group with justify-items and align-items.
trans-unit.target: 基线自对齐通过在框外添加边距来移动框以按基线对齐。自对齐是在使用 justify-self 或 align-self 时，或者在将这些值与 justify-items 和 align-items 设置为一组时。

trans-unit.source: Because <gradient>s belong to the <image> data type, they can only be used where <image>s can be used. For this reason, conic-gradient() won't work on background-color and other properties that use the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <gradient> 属于 <image> 数据类型，因此只能在可以使用 <image> 的地方使用它们。因此， conic-gradient() 无法在使用 <color> 数据类型的 background-color 和其他属性上工作。

trans-unit.source: Because <gradient>s belong to the <image> data type, they can only be used where <image>s can be used. For this reason, linear-gradient() won't work on background-color and other properties that use the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <gradient> 属于 <image> 数据类型，因此只能在可以使用 <image> 的地方使用它们。因此， linear-gradient() 将不适用于使用 <color> 数据类型的 background-color 和其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Because <gradient>s belong to the <image> data type, they can only be used where <image>s can be used. For this reason, radial-gradient() won't work on background-color and other properties that use the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <gradient> 属于 <image> 数据类型，因此只能在可以使用 <image> 的地方使用它们。因此， radial-gradient() 不适用于使用 <color> 数据类型的 background-color 和其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Because <gradient>s belong to the <image> data type, they can only be used where <image>s can be used. For this reason, repeating-conic-gradient() won't work on background-color and other properties that use the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <gradient> 属于 <image> 数据类型，因此只能在可以使用 <image> 的地方使用它们。因此， repeating-conic-gradient() 在使用 <color> 数据类型的 background-color 和其他属性上不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Because <gradient>s belong to the <image> data type, they can only be used where <image>s can be used. For this reason, repeating-linear-gradient() won't work on background-color and other properties that use the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <gradient> 属于 <image> 数据类型，因此只能在可以使用 <image> 的地方使用它们。因此， repeating-linear-gradient() 将不适用于 background-color 和其他使用 <color> 数据类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Because <gradient>s belong to the <image> data type, they can only be used where <image>s can be used. For this reason, repeating-radial-gradient() won't work on background-color and other properties that use the <color> data type.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <gradient> 属于 <image> 数据类型，因此只能在可以使用 <image> 的地方使用它们。因此， repeating-radial-gradient() 将不适用于使用 <color> 数据类型的 background-color 和其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Because High Contrast Mode themes are dynamic, use these color keywords in place of other CSS color values. This will ensure that content will always be able to be perceived.
trans-unit.target: 由于高对比度模式主题是动态的，因此请使用这些颜色关键字代替其他CSS颜色值。这将确保始终能够感知内容。

trans-unit.source: Because High Contrast Mode themes are dynamic, use these color keywords in place of other CSS color values. This will ensure that content will always be able to be perceived.
trans-unit.target: 由于高对比度模式主题是动态的，因此请使用这些颜色关键字代替其他CSS颜色值。这将确保始终能够感知内容。

trans-unit.source: Because many websites have not been developed with small devices in mind, mobile browsers differ from desktop browsers in the way they render web pages. Instead of laying out pages at the width of the device screen, they lay them out using a viewport that is much wider, usually 800 or 1000 pixels. To map the extra-wide layout back to the original device size, they either show only part of the whole render or scale the viewport down to fit.
trans-unit.target: 由于许多网站在开发时都没有考虑使用小型设备，因此移动浏览器与桌面浏览器的呈现网页方式有所不同。他们没有在设备屏幕的宽度上布置页面，而是使用更宽的视口（通常为800或1000像素）布置页面。要将超宽布局映射回原始设备尺寸，它们要么只显示整个渲染的一部分，要么将视口缩小以适合。

trans-unit.source: Because media queries provide insights into the capabilities—and by extension, the features and design—of the device the user is working with, there is the potential that they could be abused to construct a "fingerprint" which identifies the device, or at least categorizes it to some degree of detail that may be undesirable to users.
trans-unit.target: 由于媒体查询可以洞察用户正在使用的设备的功能（以及扩展的功能和设计），因此有可能滥用它们来构造“指纹”以识别设备，或者至少将其分类为某些细节，这可能是用户不希望看到的。

trans-unit.source: Because of this potential, a browser may opt to fudge the returned values in some manner in order to prevent them from being used to precisely identify a computer. A browser might also offer additional measures in this area; for example, if Firefox's "Resist Fingerprinting" setting is enabled, many media queries report default values rather than values representing the actual device state.
trans-unit.target: 由于这种可能性,浏览器可能会选择以某种方式篡改返回值,以防止它们被用于精确识别计算机。浏览器还可能在这方面提供额外的措施;例如,如果启用Firefox的 "抵制指纹 "设置,许多媒体查询报告的是默认值,而不是代表实际设备状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Because selectors do not work with anonymous boxes, they cannot be styled via a stylesheet. This means that all inheritable CSS properties have the inherit value, and all non-inheritable CSS properties, have the initial value.
trans-unit.target: 由于选择器不适用于匿名框，因此无法通过样式表设置样式。这意味着所有可继承CSS属性都具有 inherit 值，而所有不可继承CSS属性都具有 initial 值。

trans-unit.source: Because the text-underline-position property inherits and is not reset by the text-decoration shorthand property, it may be appropriate to set its value at a global level. For example, the under value may be appropriate for a document with lots of chemical and mathematical formulas, which make a large use of subscripts.
trans-unit.target: 因为 text-underline-position 属性是继承并且未被 text-decoration 速记属性重置，所以将其值设置为全局级别可能是适当的。例如， under 值可能是适当的，有很多化学和数学公式，这使大量使用标的文件。

trans-unit.source: Because the last color stop is 10% and the gradient is vertical, each gradient in the repeated gradient is 10% of the height, fitting 10 horizontal bars.
trans-unit.target: 因为最后一个色停是10%,而且渐变是垂直的,所以重复渐变中的每个渐变都是高度的10%,拟合10个水平条。

trans-unit.source: Before Chrome 26, if background images are clipped (for example, when using background-image sprites) and -webkit-print-color-adjust is set to exact, then backgrounds will appear distorted when printed. Solid backgrounds and background images that are not clipped (i.e., backgrounds that have narrower and shorter than the element to which they are applied) are printed correctly. See Chromium bug 131054.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome 26之前，如果裁剪了背景图像（例如，使用 background-image 精灵时），并且 -webkit-print-color-adjust 设置为 exact ，则背景在打印时会失真。正确打印出纯色背景和未被裁剪的背景图像（即，比应用它们的元素窄和短的背景）。参见Chromium bug 131054。

trans-unit.source: Before Chrome 4, run-in was not supported before inline elements.
trans-unit.target: Chrome 4的前， run-in 的内联元素之前没有得到支持。

trans-unit.source: Before Chrome 4, the slash / notation is unsupported. If two values are specified, then an elliptical border is drawn on all four corners. -webkit-border-radius: 40px 10px; is equivalent to border-radius: 40px / 10px;.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome 4之前，不支持斜杠 / 表示法。如果指定了两个值，则在所有四个角上绘制一个椭圆形边框。 -webkit-border-radius: 40px 10px; 等于 border-radius: 40px / 10px; 。

trans-unit.source: Before Chrome 41, the implementation was buggy and reported (hover: none) on non-touch-based computers with a mouse/trackpad. See bug 441613.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome 41之前，该实现存在错误，并且在使用鼠标/触控板的非触摸式计算机上报告 (hover: none) 。参见错误441613。

trans-unit.source: Before Chrome 52, :in-range matched disabled and read-only inputs (see Chromium bug 602568). In Chrome 52, it was changed to only match enabled read-write inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome 52之前， :in-range 匹配禁用和只读输入（请参阅Chromium bug 602568）。在Chrome 52中，将其更改为仅与启用的读写输入匹配。

trans-unit.source: Before Chrome 62, the text-transform property does not work on ::first-line pseudo-elements. See Chromium bug 129669.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome 62之前， text-transform 属性不适用于 ::first-line 伪元素。参见Chromium bug 129669。

trans-unit.source: Before Edge 15, this value was supported with the prefixed version of the property only.
trans-unit.target: 在Edge 15之前,这个值只支持该属性的前缀版本。

trans-unit.source: Before Edge 16, Microsoft Edge treats all unknown elements (such as custom elements) as the same element type.
trans-unit.target: 在Edge 16之前,Microsoft Edge将所有未知元素(如自定义元素)视为同一元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 14, some punctuation characters could interfere with correct capitalization. See bug 731536.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 14之前，某些标点符号可能会干扰正确的大小写。参见错误731536。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 15, plaintext didn't do anything to an inline element. The specification changed and the implementation was changed in Firefox 15.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 15之前， plaintext 对内联元素没有任何作用。在Firefox 15中更改了规范并更改了实现。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 16, the translation values of matrix() and matrix3d() could be <length>s, in addition to the standard <number>.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 16之前，除了标准 <number> 之外， matrix() 和 matrix3d() 的转换值还可以是 <length> >。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 23, box-sizing is not respected when the height is calculated from window.getComputedStyle().
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 23之前，从 window.getComputedStyle() 计算高度时不考虑 box-sizing 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 27, Firefox supported only single-line flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 27之前,Firefox只支持单行flexbox。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 27, only single-line flexbox is supported.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 27之前,只支持单行灵活箱。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 3, font-size-adjust was supported on Windows only.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 3之前，仅Windows才支持 font-size-adjust 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 3, the default value for the normal keyword was 0 and not 1em.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 3之前， normal 关键字的默认值为 0 而不是 1em 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 3.5, only the CSS level 2 behavior of :after was supported, which disallowed position, float, list-style-* and some display properties.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 3.5之前，仅支持 :after 的CSS 2级行为，这不允许 position ， float ， list-style-* 和某些 display 属性。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 3.5, only the CSS level 2 behavior of :before was supported, which disallowed position, float, list-style-* and some display properties.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 3.5之前，仅支持 :before 的CSS 2级行为，该行为不允许 position ， float ， list-style-* 和某些 display 属性。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 30, absolute positioning of table rows and row groups was not supported (bug 63895).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 30之前，不支持表行和行组的绝对定位（错误63895）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 32, Firefox wasn't able to animate values starting or stopping at 0.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 32之前，Firefox无法为从 0 开始或停止的值设置动画。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 36, gradients weren't applied on the pre-multiplied color space, leading to shades of grey unexpectedly appearing when used with transparency.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 36之前,渐变并没有应用在预增色空间上,导致在使用透明度时意外地出现灰色的阴影。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 38, Firefox added a dot as suffix of the number for ethiopic-numeric (for example, ፫. instead of ፫). The specification later defined the absence of a suffix, which Firefox 38 followed.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 38之前，Firefox在 ethiopic-numeric 的数字后缀中添加了一个点（例如，用፫。代替፫）。后来，该规范定义了不存在后缀，Firefox 38遵循该后缀。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, the <percentage> was relative to the width of the box even when specifying the radius for a height. This implied that -moz-border-radius-bottomleft was always drawing an arc of circle, and never an ellipse, when followed by a single value.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，即使指定高度的半径， <percentage> 还是相对于框的宽度。这表示当 -moz-border-radius-bottomleft 跟随单个值时，它始终绘制圆弧，而不绘制椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, the <percentage> was relative to the width of the box even when specifying the radius for a height. This implied that -moz-border-radius-bottomright was always drawing an arc of circle, and never an ellipse, when followed by a single value.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，即使指定高度的半径， <percentage> 还是相对于框的宽度。这意味着 -moz-border-radius-bottomright 后面总是单个值时，总是绘制圆弧，而不是椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, the <percentage> was relative to the width of the box even when specifying the radius for a height. This implied that -moz-border-radius-topleft was always drawing an arc of circle, and never an ellipse, when followed by a single value.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，即使指定高度的半径， <percentage> 还是相对于框的宽度。这表示当 -moz-border-radius-topleft 跟随单个值时，它始终绘制圆弧，而不绘制椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 4, the <percentage> was relative to the width of the box even when specifying the radius for a height. This implied that -moz-border-radius-topright was always drawing an arc of circle, and never an ellipse, when followed by a single value.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 4之前，即使指定高度的半径， <percentage> 还是相对于框的宽度。这表示当 -moz-border-radius-topright 跟随单个值时，它始终绘制圆弧，而不绘制椭圆。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 40, font-size-adjust: 0 was incorrectly interpreted as font-size-adjust: none (bug 1144885).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 40之前， font-size-adjust: 0 被错误地解释为 font-size-adjust: none （错误1144885）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 43, Firefox supported will-change: will-change, which is invalid by the specification.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 43之前的版本中，Firefox支持 will-change: will-change ，该规范无效。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 44, oblique was not distinguished from italic.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 44之前， oblique 与 italic 没有区别。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 44, position: fixed didn't create a stacking context in most cases. Firefox and the specification have been modified to mimic Chrome and Safari's long-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 44之前的 position: fixed 在大多数情况下不会创建堆栈上下文。Firefox及其规范已被修改，以模仿Chrome和Safari的长期行为。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 50, :in-range matched disabled and read-only inputs (see bug 1264157). In Firefox 50, it was changed to only match enabled read-write inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 50之前， :in-range 匹配禁用和只读输入（请参见bug 1264157）。在Firefox 50中，将其更改为仅与启用的读写输入匹配。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 50, the plaintext value was ignored for vertical writing modes (bug 1302734).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 50之前，垂直书写模式将忽略 plaintext 值（错误1302734）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 53, this property was not animatable.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 53之前,这个属性是不可动画化的。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57 calc(1*2*3) is not parsed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，无法成功解析 calc(1*2*3) 。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, Firefox does not repaint elements outside the viewport that are animated into the viewport with a delay. This bug affects only some platforms, such as Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前,Firefox不会重新绘制视口外的元素,这些元素在进入视口的动画中会有延迟。这个错误只影响某些平台,如Windows。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, Firefox had a bug where ::after pseudo-elements were still generated, even if the content property value were set to normal or none.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，Firefox存在一个错误，即使将 content 属性值设置为 normal 或 none ，仍然会生成 ::after 伪元素。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, Firefox had a bug where ::before pseudo-elements were still generated, even if the content property value were set to normal or none.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，Firefox的一个错误是即使将 content 属性值设置为 normal 或 none ，仍然会生成 ::before 伪元素。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, absolute positioning did not work correctly when applied to elements inside tables that have border-collapse applied to them (bug 1379306).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前的版本中，将绝对定位应用于具有 border-collapse 表中的元素时，它们不能正确工作（错误1379306）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, animations using em units are not affected by changes to the font-size of the animated element's parent (bug 1254424).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，使用em单位的动画不受动画元素的父 font-size 的更改的影响（错误1254424）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, cancelling a filling animation (for example, with animation-fill-mode: forwards set) can trigger a transition set on the same element, although only once (see bug 1192592 and these test cases for more information).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，取消填充动画（例如，使用 animation-fill-mode: forwards set）可以触发在同一元素上的过渡集，尽管只有一次（有关更多信息，请参见bug 1192592和这些测试用例）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, some language settings' inherited font-size is smaller than expected (bug 1391341).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，某些语言设置的继承 font-size 小于预期值（错误1391341）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, the background-position property can't be transitioned between two values containing different numbers of <position> values, for example background-position: 10px 10px; and background-position: 20px 20px, 30px 30px; (see bug 1390446).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，不能在两个包含不同数量 <position> 值的值之间转换 background-position 属性，例如 background-position: 10px 10px; 和 background-position: 20px 20px, 30px 30px; （请参见错误1390446）。

trans-unit.source: Before Firefox 57, transitions do not work when transitioning from a text-shadow with a color specified to a text-shadow without a color specified (see bug 726550).
trans-unit.target: 火狐57之前，从转换时的转换不起作用 text-shadow 与指定的彩色 text-shadow 不指定颜色（参见错误726550）。

trans-unit.source: Before Internet Explorer 7, Internet Explorer incorrectly interprets clip: auto as clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto).
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 7之前，Internet Explorer会错误地将 clip: auto 解释为 clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto) 。

trans-unit.source: Before Opera 11.60, replaced elements with border-radius do not have rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 在Opera 11.60之前，用 border-radius 替换的元素没有圆角。

trans-unit.source: Before Opera 15, Opera does not handle dynamically inserted elements for :nth-child().
trans-unit.target: 在Opera 15之前，Opera不处理 :nth-child() 动态插入的元素。

trans-unit.source: Before Opera 39, :in-range matched disabled and read-only inputs (see Chromium bug 602568). In Opera 39, it was changed to only match enabled read-write inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在Opera 39之前， :in-range 匹配禁用和只读输入（请参阅Chromium bug 602568）。在Opera 39中，将其更改为仅与启用的读写输入匹配。

trans-unit.source: Before Safari 5, run-in was not supported before inline elements.
trans-unit.target: Safari 5的前， run-in 的内联元素之前没有得到支持。

trans-unit.source: Before Safari 5, the slash / notation is unsupported. If two values are specified, then an elliptical border is drawn on all four corners. -webkit-border-radius: 40px 10px; is equivalent to border-radius: 40px / 10px;.
trans-unit.target: 在Safari 5之前，不支持斜杠 / 表示法。如果指定了两个值，则在所有四个角上绘制一个椭圆形边框。 -webkit-border-radius: 40px 10px; 等于 border-radius: 40px / 10px; 。

trans-unit.source: Before Samsung Internet 8.0, the text-transform property does not work on ::first-line pseudo-elements. See Chromium bug 129669.
trans-unit.target: 在Samsung Internet 8.0之前， text-transform 属性不适用于 ::first-line 伪元素。参见Chromium bug 129669。

trans-unit.source: Before WebView 62, the text-transform property does not work on ::first-line pseudo-elements. See Chromium bug 129669.
trans-unit.target: 在WebView 62之前， text-transform 属性不适用于 ::first-line 伪元素。参见Chromium bug 129669。

trans-unit.source: Before about 2010, the CSS:visited selector allowed websites to uncover a user's browsing history and figure out what sites the user had visited. This was done through window.getComputedStyle and other techniques. This process was quick to execute, and made it possible not only to determine where the user had been on the web, but could also be used to guess a lot of information about the user's identity.
trans-unit.target: 在2010 年前后，通过CSS :visited 选择器允许网站发现用户的浏览历史记录，并确定用户访问了哪些网站。这是通过 window.getComputedStyle 和其他技术完成的。这个过程执行起来很快，不仅可以确定用户在网上的位置，而且还可以用来猜测有关用户身份的许多信息。

trans-unit.source: Before diving in to look at the results of using different kinds of source images and seeing how they look when used with background-size, it would be helpful to look at a few example source images that have different dimensions and sizing settings.
trans-unit.target: 在深入研究使用不同种类的源图像的结果并查看它们与 background-size 一起使用时的外观之前，先看一些具有不同尺寸和大小设置的示例源图像会很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Before using page-break-before, check if you can use break-before instead. In the future page-break-before will be a mere alias for some values of it.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 page-break-before 之前，请检查是否可以使用 break-before 。将来， page-break-before 仅仅是其某些值的别名。

trans-unit.source: Before using any shorthand it is worth remembering that shorthands not only enable the setting of many properties in one go, they also act to reset things to their initial values that you do not, or cannot set in the shorthand. Therefore if you use a shorthand, be aware that it may reset things you have applied elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 在使用任何速记之前，要记住，速记不仅可以一次性启用许多属性的设置，而且还可以将内容重置为您没有或无法在速记中设置的初始值。因此，如果您使用速记，请注意它可能会重置您在其他位置应用的内容。

trans-unit.source: Before version 4, run-in was not supported before inline elements.
trans-unit.target: 在版本4 之前，内联元素之前不支持 run-in 。

trans-unit.source: Before version 48, Firefox did not implement layout support for tate-chū-yoko.
trans-unit.target: 在48版本之前,Firefox没有实现对tate-chū-yoko的布局支持。

trans-unit.source: Before version 52, :in-range matched disabled and read-only inputs (see Chromium bug 602568). In version 52, it was changed to only match enabled read-write inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在版本52之前， :in-range 匹配禁用和只读输入（请参阅Chromium bug 602568）。在版本52中，将其更改为仅与启用的读写输入匹配。

trans-unit.source: Before version 6.0, :in-range matched disabled and read-only inputs (see Chromium bug 602568). In version 6.0, it was changed to only match enabled read-write inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在6.0版之前， :in-range 匹配禁用和只读输入（请参阅Chromium bug 602568）。在6.0版中，将其更改为仅与启用的读写输入匹配。

trans-unit.source: Before version 81, Firefox implemented the property as animatable. This was corrected to spec in 81.
trans-unit.target: 在81版之前,Firefox实现了该属性的动画化。这在81版中被修正为规范。

trans-unit.source: Before we can make sense of these properties we need to consider the concept of available space. What we are doing when we change the value of these flex properties is to change the way that available space is distributed amongst our items. This concept of available space is also important when we come to look at aligning items.
trans-unit.target: 在我们理解这些属性之前，我们需要考虑可用空间的概念。更改这些flex属性的值时，我们正在做的是更改可用空间在项目之间分配的方式。当我们考虑对齐项目时，可用空间的概念也很重要。

trans-unit.source: Behaves the same as auto-fill, except that after placing the grid items any empty repeated tracks are collapsed. An empty track is one with no in-flow grid items placed into or spanning across it. (This can result in all tracks being collapsed, if they’re all empty.)
trans-unit.target: 行为与 auto-fill 相同，不同之处在于，放置网格项目后，所有空的重复轨道都将折叠。空轨道是指没有流入网格或跨越网格的网格项目。（如果所有轨道都是空的，则可能导致所有轨道被折叠。）

trans-unit.source: Behaves the same as auto, but with the scrollbars drawn on top of content instead of taking up space. Only supported in WebKit-based (e.g., Safari) and Blink-based (e.g., Chrome or Opera) browsers.
trans-unit.target: 行为与 auto 相同，但滚动条绘制在内容顶部，而不占用空间。仅在基于WebKit（例如Safari）和基于Blink（例如Chrome或Opera）的浏览器中受支持。

trans-unit.source: Behaves the same as column but the main-start and main-end are permuted.
trans-unit.target: 行为与 column 相同，但置换了main-start和main-end。

trans-unit.source: Behaves the same as row but the main-start and main-end points are permuted.
trans-unit.target: 行为与 row 相同，但主要起点和主要终点被置换。

trans-unit.source: Behaves the same as wrap but cross-start and cross-end are permuted.
trans-unit.target: 行为与 wrap 相同，但可以置换交叉起点和交叉终点。

trans-unit.source: Box generation is the part of the CSS visual formatting model that creates boxes from the document's elements. Generated boxes are of different types, which affect how the visual formatting is done. The type of the box generated depends on the value of the display CSS property.

trans-unit.source: Browser support
trans-unit.target: 浏览器支持

trans-unit.source: Browser support for @viewport is weak at this time, with support being largely available in Internet Explorer and Edge. Even in those browsers, only a small number of descriptors are available. Browsers will ignore @viewport if they don't support it, and will ignore any descriptors that they don't recognize.
trans-unit.target: 目前，浏览器对 @viewport 的支持很弱，Internet Explorer和Edge大部分都提供对浏览器的支持。即使在那些浏览器中，也只有少量的描述符可用。如果浏览器不支持 @viewport ，它们将忽略它们，并且将忽略它们无法识别的任何描述符。

trans-unit.source: Browser support for display:contents is limited and required for this demo to work. Firefox supports display: contents already, and the value is being implemented in Chrome. Once there is better browser support this feature will be very useful in circumstances where you need the markup for semantic reasons but do not want to display the box that it would generate by default.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器对 display:contents 的支持是有限的，并且需要此演示才能正常运行。Firefox支持 display: contents 已经存在内容，并且该值正在Chrome中实现。一旦有了更好的浏览器支持，此功能在出于语义原因需要标记但不想显示默认情况下会生成的框的情况下将非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Browser support for flexbox is excellent, and the majority of browsers do not need a prefix at this point. Safari was the last of the major browsers to remove prefixes, with the release of Safari 9 in 2015. The two browsers you should still keep in mind for cross-browser compatibility are:
trans-unit.target: 浏览器对flexbox的支持是非常好的,目前大部分浏览器都不需要前缀。Safari是各大浏览器中最后一个去掉前缀的浏览器,2015年发布了Safari 9。为了保证跨浏览器的兼容性,你还是应该记住这两款浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Browsers are updating their rendering engines to remove this prefix, however the prefixed versions will be maintained as aliases, making them safe to use.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器正在更新他们的渲染引擎,以删除这个前缀,然而前缀版本将作为别名被保留下来,使它们可以安全使用。

trans-unit.source: Browsers are updating their rendering engines to remove this prefix, however the prefixed versions will be maintained as aliases, making them safe to use. At the present time, some browsers do not support the unprefixed versions, which is why the live examples in this guide use grid- prefixed versions.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器正在更新其渲染引擎以删除此前缀，但是带前缀的版本将保留为别名，使它们可以安全使用。当前，某些浏览器不支持非前缀版本，因此本指南中的实时示例使用 grid- 前缀的版本。

trans-unit.source: Browsers are updating to remove this prefix, however the prefixed versions will be maintained as aliases making them safe to use.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器正在更新以删除这个前缀,但前缀版本将作为别名保留,使其可以安全使用。

trans-unit.source: Browsers are updating to remove this prefix, however the prefixed versions will be maintained as aliases making them safe to use. At the present time, some browsers do not support the unprefixed versions which is why the live examples in this guide use grid- prefixed versions.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器正在更新以删除这个前缀,但是前缀版本将作为别名被保留,使其可以安全使用。目前,一些浏览器不支持无前缀的版本,这就是为什么本指南中的实时示例使用网格前缀的版本。

trans-unit.source: Browsers display items as part of a block or inline formatting context in terms of what normally makes sense for that element. For example a strong element is used to highlight a word, and displays bold in browsers. It would not generally make sense for that strong element to be displayed as a block level element, breaking onto a new line. If you did want all strong elements to display as block elements, you could do so by setting display: block on strong. This means that you can always use the most semantic HTML element to markup your content, and then change the way it displays using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 根据通常对该元素有意义的内容，浏览器将项目显示为块或行内格式化上下文的一部分。例如，强元素用于突出显示单词，并在浏览器中显示为粗体。通常，将该强元素显示为块级元素，然后换行，则没有任何意义。如果确实希望所有强元素都显示为块元素，则可以通过将 display: block 设置为 strong 来实现。这意味着您始终可以使用最语义化的HTML元素标记您的内容，然后使用CSS更改其显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Browsers display items as part of a block or inline formatting context in terms of what normally makes sense for that element. For example, a <strong> element is used to highlight a word and displays bold in browsers. It would not generally make sense for that <strong> element to be displayed as a block level element, breaking onto a new line. If you did want all <strong> elements to display as block elements, you could do so by setting display: block on <strong>. This means that you can always use most of the semantic HTML elements to markup your content, and then change the way it displays using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 根据通常对该元素有意义的内容，浏览器将项目显示为块或行内格式化上下文的一部分。例如， <strong> 元素用于突出显示单词并在浏览器中显示为粗体。通常，将该 <strong> 元素显示为块级元素，并插入新行是没有意义的。如果确实希望所有 <strong> 元素都显示为块元素，则可以通过在 <strong> 上设置 display: block 来实现。这意味着您始终可以使用大多数语义HTML元素来标记内容，然后使用CSS更改其显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Browsers do not provide any special information on background images to assistive technology. This is important primarily for screen readers, as a screen reader will not announce its presence and therefore convey nothing to its users. If the image contains information critical to understanding the page's overall purpose, it is better to describe it semantically in the document.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器不会向辅助技术提供任何关于背景图片的特殊信息。这主要对屏幕阅读器很重要,因为屏幕阅读器不会宣布它的存在,因此不会向用户传达任何信息。如果图像包含对理解页面整体目的至关重要的信息,最好在文档中对其进行语义描述。

trans-unit.source: Browsers do not provide any special information on background images to assistive technology. This is important primarily for screen readers, as a screen reader will not announce its presence and therefore convey nothing to its users. If the image contains information critical to understanding the page's overall purpose, it is better to describe it semantically in the document. When using background images, make sure the contrast in color is great enough that any text is legible over the image as well as if the images is missing.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器不会向辅助技术提供任何关于背景图片的特殊信息。这主要对屏幕阅读器很重要,因为屏幕阅读器不会宣布它的存在,因此不会向用户传达任何信息。如果图像包含对理解页面整体目的至关重要的信息,最好在文档中对其进行语义描述。当使用背景图片时,要确保颜色的对比度足够大,任何文字在图片上都清晰可辨,以及如果图片缺失。

trans-unit.source: Browsers do not provide any special information on background images to assistive technology. This is important primarily for screen readers, as a screen reader will not announce its presence and therefore convey nothing to its users. While it is possible to create pie charts, checkerboards, and other effects with conic gradients, CSS images provide no native way to assign alternative text, and therefore the image represented by the conic gradient will not be accessible to screen reader users. If the image contains information critical to understanding the page's overall purpose, it is better to describe it semantically in the document.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器不会向辅助技术提供任何关于背景图片的特殊信息。这一点主要对屏幕阅读器很重要,因为屏幕阅读器不会宣布它的存在,因此不会向用户传达任何信息。虽然可以用圆锥渐变创建饼图、棋盘和其他效果,但CSS图像没有提供分配替代文本的本地方法,因此圆锥渐变所代表的图像将无法被屏幕阅读器用户访问。如果图片中包含了对理解页面整体目的至关重要的信息,最好在文档中用语义描述。

trans-unit.source: Browsers have added an internal aspect-ratio property that applies to replaced elements and other related elements that accept width and height attributes. This appears in the browser's internal UA stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器添加了一个内部 aspect-ratio 属性，该属性适用于替换的元素以及接受 width 和 height 属性的其他相关元素。这将显示在浏览器的内部UA样式表中。

trans-unit.source: Browsers often implement several more, prefixed, keywords: Gecko implements -moz-window, -moz-document, -moz-desktop, -moz-info, -moz-dialog, -moz-button, -moz-pull-down-menu, -moz-list, and -moz-field.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器通常实现更多前缀的关键字：Gecko实现 -moz-window ， -moz-document ， -moz-desktop ， -moz-info ， -moz-dialog ， -moz-button ， -moz-pull-down-menu ， -moz-list 和 -moz-field 。

trans-unit.source: Browsers that understand image() also understand the fragment notation. Therefore, if the fragment is not understood within image(), the image will be considered invalid.
trans-unit.target: 了解 image() 的浏览器也了解片段表示法。因此，如果无法在 image() 中理解该片段，则该图像将被视为无效。

trans-unit.source: Browsers will remove any element with a display value of contents set on it from the accessibility tree. This will cause the element and all its descendant elements to no longer be announced by screen reading technology.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将从可访问性树中删除任何 display contents 设置为其值的元素。这将导致该元素及其所有后代元素不再通过屏幕阅读技术宣布。

trans-unit.source: But the geometricPrecision property — when fully supported by the rendering engine — lets you scale your text fluidly. For large scale factors, you might see less-than-beautiful text rendering, but the size is what you would expect—neither rounded up nor down to the nearest font size supported by Windows or Linux.
trans-unit.target: 但是当渲染引擎完全支持 geometricPrecision 属性时，您可以流畅地缩放文本。对于大比例尺来说，您可能会看到效果不佳的文本呈现，但是大小却是您所期望的-既不舍入也不舍入到Windows或Linux支持的最接近的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: By adding column-count or column-width to an element, that element becomes a multi-column container, or multicol container for short. The columns are anonymous boxes and described as column boxes in the specification.
trans-unit.target: 通过向元素添加 column-count 或 column-width ，该元素将成为多列容器或简称multicol容器。这些列是匿名框，在规范中称为列框。

trans-unit.source: By adding display: contents to the wrapper around the nested elements, you can see that that item has disappeared from the layout, allowing the two sub-children to be laid out as if they were direct children of the flex container. You can try removing the display: contents line to see it return.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 display: contents 添加到嵌套元素周围的包装器中，您可以看到该项目已从布局中消失，从而允许将两个子子级布置为好像它们是flex容器的直接子级。您可以尝试删除 display: contents 行以查看返回。

trans-unit.source: By adding more angled color-stop points on the gradient arc, you can create a highly customized transition between multiple colors. A color-stop's position can be explicitly defined by using an <angle>. If you don't specify the location of a color stop, it is placed halfway between the one that precedes it and the one that follows it. If you don't specify an angle for the first or last color stop, their values are 0deg and 360deg respectively. The following two gradients are equivalent
trans-unit.target: 通过在渐变弧上添加更多有角度的颜色停止点，可以在多种颜色之间创建高度自定义的过渡。可以使用 <angle> 明确定义色标的位置。如果未指定色标的位置，则将其放置在色标之前和之后的中间。如果未为第一个或最后一个色标指定角度，则它们的值分别为0deg和360deg。以下两个梯度是等效的

trans-unit.source: By adding more angled color-stop points on the gradient arc, you can create a highly customized transition between multiple colors. A color-stop's position can be explicitly defined by using an <angle>. If you don't specify the location of a color stop, it is placed halfway between the one that precedes it and the one that follows it. Like the non-repeating gradient counterpart, If you don't specify an angle for the first or last color stop, the values are will be 0deg and 360deg. If you don't declare an angle for either, you'll get a non-repeating conic gradient. If you declare a non 0 or 360degree for the first or last respectively, the gradient will repeat based on that value. For example, if you don't declare an angle for the first color, and declare 10% on the last color stop, the arc will repeat 10 times. Rather, the starting point is the first color stop declared, and the last color stop is the last color stop angle declared.. The following two gradients are equivalent
trans-unit.target: 通过在渐变弧上添加更多有角度的颜色停止点，可以在多种颜色之间创建高度自定义的过渡。可以使用 <angle> 明确定义色标的位置。如果未指定色标的位置，则将其放置在色标前面的位置和色标后面的位置之间的中间位置。像非重复渐变对应项一样，如果未为第一个或最后一个色标指定角度，则值将为0deg和360deg。如果您都不为两者声明一个角度，则将获得一个非重复的圆锥形渐变。如果您分别为第一个或最后一个声明非0度或360度，则渐变将基于该值重复。例如，如果您没有为第一种颜色声明角度，而是在最后一个色标处声明10％，则圆弧将重复10次。相反，起点是声明的第一个色标，最后一个色标是声明的最后色标角度。以下两个渐变是等效的

trans-unit.source: By adding more color-stop points on the gradient line, you can create a highly customized transition between multiple colors. A color-stop's position can be explicitly defined by using a <length> or a <percentage>. If you don't specify the location of a color, it is placed halfway between the one that precedes it and the one that follows it. The following two gradients are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 通过在渐变线上添加更多颜色停止点，可以在多种颜色之间创建高度自定义的过渡。可以使用 <length> 或 <percentage> 明确定义色标的位置。如果您未指定颜色的位置，则将其放置在颜色之前和之后的中间位置。以下两个梯度是等效的。

trans-unit.source: By adding more color-stop points on the gradient line, you can create a highly customized transition between the starting and ending colors. A color-stop's position can be explicitly defined by using a <length> or a <percentage>. If you don't specify the location, it is placed halfway between the one that precedes it and the one that follows it.
trans-unit.target: 通过在渐变线上添加更多颜色停止点，可以在开始和结束颜色之间创建高度自定义的过渡。可以使用 <length> 或 <percentage> 明确定义色标的位置。如果您未指定位置，则将其放置在该位置之前和之后的位置之间。

trans-unit.source: By allowing authors to provide their own fonts, @font-face makes it possible to design content without being limited to the so-called "safe" fonts (that is, the fonts which are so common that they're considered to be universally available). The ability to specify the name of a locally-installed font to look for and use makes it possible to customize the font beyond the basics while making it possible to do so without relying on an Internet connection.
trans-unit.target: 通过允许作者提供自己的字体， @font-face 使得设计内容成为可能，而不仅限于所谓的“安全”字体（即，通用字体被认为可以普遍获得） ）。可以指定要查找和使用的本地安装字体的名称的功能使得可以在不依赖Internet连接的情况下自定义基本字体，同时也可以自定义字体。

trans-unit.source: By allowing authors to provide their own fonts, @font-face makes it possible to design content without being limited to the so-called "web-safe" fonts (that is, the fonts which are so common that they're considered to be universally available). The ability to specify the name of a locally-installed font to look for and use makes it possible to customize the font beyond the basics while making it possible to do so without relying on an Internet connection.
trans-unit.target: 通过允许作者提供自己的字体， @font-face 使得设计内容成为可能，而不受限于所谓的“网络安全”字体（即，普遍认为它们被认为是普遍可用）。可以指定要查找和使用的本地安装字体的名称的功能使得可以在不依赖Internet连接的情况下自定义基本字体，同时也可以自定义字体。

trans-unit.source: By combining the align and justify properties we can easily center an item inside a grid area.
trans-unit.target: 通过结合align和justify属性,我们可以很容易地在网格区域内将一个项目居中。

trans-unit.source: By default block elements will consume all of the space in the inline direction, so our paragraphs spread out and get as big as they can inside their containing block. If we give them a width, the will continue to lay out one below the other - even if there would be space for them to be side by side. Each will start against the start edge of the containing block, so the place at which sentences would begin in that writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,块元素会占用内联方向的所有空间,因此我们的段落会在其包含的块内尽可能地展开并变得更大。如果我们给它们一个宽度,它们将继续一个比一个低,即使有空间让它们并排排列。每个段落都会靠着包含块的起始边缘开始,所以在该写作模式下,句子会在哪个地方开始。

trans-unit.source: By default block elements will consume all of the space in the inline direction, so our paragraphs spread out and get as big as they can inside their containing block. If we give them a width, they will continue to lay out one below the other - even if there would be space for them to be side by side. Each will start against the start edge of the containing block, so the place at which sentences would begin in that writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,块元素会占用内联方向的所有空间,因此我们的段落会在其包含的块内尽可能地展开并变得更大。如果我们给它们一个宽度,它们将继续一个比一个低,即使有空间让它们并排排列。每个段落都会靠着包含块的起始边缘开始,所以在该写作模式下,句子会在哪个地方开始。

trans-unit.source: By default flex items don't shrink below their minimum content size. To change this, set the item's min-width or min-height.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，弹性项目不会缩小到其最小内容大小以下。要更改此设置，请设置项目的 min-width 或 min-height 。

trans-unit.source: By default in the CSS box model, the width and height you assign to an element is applied only to the element's content box. If the element has any border or padding, this is then added to the width and height to arrive at the size of the box that's rendered on the screen. This means that when you set width and height, you have to adjust the value you give to allow for any border or padding that may be added. For example, if you have four boxes with width: 25%;, if any has left or right padding or a left or right border, they will not by default fit on one line within the constraints of the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在CSS框模型中，您分配给元素的 width 和 height 仅应用于元素的内容框。如果元素具有任何边框或填充，则将其添加到 width 和 height 以达到在屏幕上渲染的框的大小。这意味着，当您设置 width 和 height 时，必须调整给出的值，以允许添加任何边框或填充。例如，如果您有四个 width: 25%; 盒子：，如果任何元素具有左或右填充或左或右边框，则默认情况下它们将不适合父容器的约束中的一行。

trans-unit.source: By default in the CSS box model, the width and height you assign to an element is applied only to the element's content box. If the element has any border or padding, this is then added to the width and height to arrive at the size of the box that's rendered on the screen. This means that when you set width and height, you have to adjust the value you give to allow for any border or padding that may be added.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在CSS框模型中，您分配给元素的宽度和高度仅应用于元素的内容框。如果该元素具有任何边框或填充，则将其添加到宽度和高度中，以达到在屏幕上呈现的框的大小。这意味着，当您设置宽度和高度时，必须调整给出的值，以允许添加任何边框或填充。

trans-unit.source: By default, min-width is set as close as possible to the initial viewport considering the minimum width constraint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， min-width 被设置为尽可能地接近考虑最小宽度约束的初始视口。

trans-unit.source: By default, Gecko applies a style that creates a red "glow" (using the box-shadow property) around items, which have this pseudo-class applied. See the :invalid pseudo-class for an example that shows how to override the default style.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Gecko应用一种样式，该样式在应用了此伪类的项目周围创建红色“辉光”（使用 box-shadow 属性）。有关显示如何覆盖默认样式的示例，请参见 :invalid 伪类。

trans-unit.source: By default, Gecko applies a style that creates a red "glow" (using the box-shadow property) around items, which have this pseudo-class applied. See the :invalid pseudo-class for an example that shows how to override the default style. The specification for :user-invalid is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Gecko应用一种样式，该样式在应用了该伪类的项目周围创建红色“辉光”（使用 box-shadow 属性）。有关显示如何覆盖默认样式的示例，请参见 :invalid 伪类。 :user-invalid 的规范仍在进行中。

trans-unit.source: By default, Gecko does not apply a style to the :invalid pseudo-class. However, it does apply a style (a red "glow" using the box-shadow property) to the :-moz-ui-invalid pseudo-class, which applies in a subset of cases for :invalid.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Gecko不会将样式应用于 :invalid 伪类。但是，它确实将样式（使用 box-shadow 属性使用红色的“辉光” ）应用于 :-moz-ui-invalid 伪类，该伪类在 :invalid 的情况下适用。

trans-unit.source: By default, HTML's lang attribute tells browsers to display glyphs designed specifically for that language. For example, a lot of fonts have a special character for the digraph fi that merge the dot on the "i" with the "f." However, if the language is set to Turkish the typeface will likely know not to use the merged glyph; Turkish has two versions of the "i," one with a dot (i) and one without (ı), and using the ligature would incorrectly transform a dotted "i" into a dotless "i."
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，HTML的 lang 属性告诉浏览器显示专门为该语言设计的字形。例如，许多字体对于有向图 fi 具有特殊字符，这些字体将“ i”上的点与“ f”合并。但是，如果将语言设置为土耳其语，则字体可能会知道不使用合并的字形。土耳其语有两个版本的“ i”，一个带有点（ i ），一个不 ı （ı），并且使用连字将把点“ i”错误地转换为无点“ i”。

trans-unit.source: By default, Internet Explorer and Edge display a moving dots animation for an indeterminate progress bar. By setting animation-name on ::-ms-fill, you can change the animation, as shown in this table:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Internet Explorer和Edge会为不确定的进度栏显示移动的点动画。通过在 ::-ms-fill 上设置 animation-name ，可以更改动画，如下表所示：

trans-unit.source: By default, Safari on iOS does not use the :active state unless there is a touchstart event handler on the relevant element or on the <body> element.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，iOS上的Safari不会使用 :active 状态，除非相关元素或 <body> 元素上有 touchstart 事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: By default, a gradient evenly progresses between the colors of two adjacent color stops, with the midpoint between those two color stops being the midpoint color value. You can control the interpolation, or progression, between two color stops by including a color hint location. In this example, the color reaches the midpoint between lime and cyan 20% of the way through the gradient rather than 50% of the way through. The second example does not contain the hint to hilight the difference the color hint can make:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,渐变在两个相邻色块的颜色之间均匀地进行,这两个色块之间的中点就是中点颜色值。你可以通过包含一个颜色提示位置来控制两个色阶之间的插值或渐变。在这个例子中,颜色在渐变的20%处达到青色和青色之间的中点,而不是50%处。第二个例子没有包含提示,以突出颜色提示可以带来的差异。

trans-unit.source: By default, colors transition smoothly from the color at one color stop to the color at the subsequent color stop, with the midpoint between the colors being the half way point between the color transition. You can move this color transition midpoint to any point between two color stops by adding a color hint, indicating where the middle of the color transition should be.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,颜色从一个色站的颜色平滑过渡到后续色站的颜色,颜色之间的中点是颜色过渡的中间点。您可以通过添加颜色提示,将这个颜色过渡中点移动到两个色站之间的任何一点,指明颜色过渡的中间点应该在哪里。

trans-unit.source: By default, colors transition smoothly from the color at one color stop to the color at the subsequent color stop, with the midpoint between the colors being the half way point between the color transition. You can move this color transition midpoint to any point between two color stops by adding a color hint, indicating where the middle of the color transition should be. The following is solid red from the start to the 10% mark, transitions from red to blue over 80% of the turn, with the final 10% being solid blue. The midpoint of the red to blue gradient change, however, is at the 20% mark rather than the 50% mark as would have happened without the 80grad, or 20%, color hint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,颜色从一个色站的颜色平滑过渡到后续色站的颜色,颜色之间的中点是颜色过渡的中间点。你可以通过添加一个颜色提示,将这个颜色过渡中点移动到两个色站之间的任何一点,指明颜色过渡的中间点应该在哪里。下面从开始到10%的标记是纯红色,在80%的转折处由红色过渡到蓝色,最后10%是纯蓝色。不过,红色到蓝色渐变的中点是在20%的标志处,而不是像没有80grad,也就是20%的颜色提示那样,在50%的标志处。

trans-unit.source: By default, colors transition smoothly from the color at one color stop to the color at the subsequent color stop, with the midpoint between the colors being the half way point between the color transition. You can move this midpoint to any position between two color stops by adding an unlabelled % color hint between the two colors to indicate where the middle of the color transition should be. The following example is solid red from the start to the 10% mark and solid blue from 90% to the end. Between 10% and 90% the color transitions from red to blue, however the midpoint of the transition is at the 30% mark rather than 50% as would have happened without the 30% color hint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,颜色从一个色站的颜色平滑过渡到后续色站的颜色,颜色之间的中点是颜色过渡的中间点。您可以将这个中点移动到两个色站之间的任何位置,方法是在两个颜色之间添加一个未标记的%颜色提示,以指示颜色过渡的中间点应该在哪里。下面的例子从开始到10%的标记是实心红色,从90%到结束是实心蓝色。在10%和90%之间,颜色从红色过渡到蓝色,但是过渡的中点在30%处,而不是像没有30%颜色提示时那样在50%处。

trans-unit.source: By default, if there is no color with a 0% stop, the first color declared will be at that point. Similarly, the last color will continue to the 100% mark, or be at the 100% mark if no length has been declared on that last stop.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,如果没有0%止点的颜色,则声明的第一个颜色将在该点。同样,最后一个颜色将继续到100%的标记,如果最后一个停止点上没有声明长度,则在100%的标记。

trans-unit.source: By default, it is possible for you to get a break between the image and its caption, which is not what we want. To avoid this, we have set break-inside: avoid on the <figure>, which causes them to always stay together.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您可能会在图像与其标题之间出现中断，这不是我们想要的。为了避免这种情况，我们设置了 break-inside: avoid 在 <figure> 上使用，这会使它们始终保持在一起。

trans-unit.source: By default, linear gradients run from top to bottom. You can change their rotation by specifying a direction.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,线性梯度从上到下运行。你可以通过指定一个方向来改变它们的旋转。

trans-unit.source: By default, mobile browsers tend to provide a "bounce" effect or even a page refresh when the top or bottom of a page (or other scroll area) is reached. You may also have noticed that when you have a dialog box with scrolling content on top of a page of scrolling content, once the dialog box's scroll boundary is reached, the underlying page will then start to scroll — this is called scroll chaining.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当到达页面的顶部或底部（或其他滚动区域）时，移动浏览器倾向于提供“反弹”效果，甚至刷新页面。您可能还已经注意到，当对话框中的滚动内容位于滚动内容页面的顶部时，一旦达到对话框的滚动边界，基础页面就会开始滚动-这称为滚动链接。

trans-unit.source: By default, most browsers apply a special color value to visited links. Thus, the links in this example will probably have special font colors only before you visit them. (After that, you'll need to clear your browser history to see them again.) However, the background-color values are likely to remain, as most browsers do not set that property on visited links by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，大多数浏览器将特殊的 color 值应用于访问的链接。因此，此示例中的链接可能只有在您访问它们之前才具有特殊的字体颜色。 （此后，您需要清除浏览器历史记录才能再次看到它们。）但是， background-color 值可能会保留，因为大多数浏览器默认情况下不会在访问的链接上设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, most browsers use an automatic table layout algorithm. The widths of the table and its cells are adjusted to fit the content.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,大多数浏览器使用自动表格布局算法。表格及其单元格的宽度会被调整以适应内容。

trans-unit.source: By default, no style is applied. You can use this pseudo-class to customize the appearance of the submit button when there are invalid form fields.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,不应用任何样式。当有无效的表单字段时,您可以使用这个伪类来定制提交按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: By default, panning (scrolling) and pinching gestures are handled exclusively by the browser. An application using Pointer_events will receive a pointercancel event when the browser starts handling a touch gesture. By explicitly specifying which gestures should be handled by the browser, an application can supply its own behavior in pointermove and pointerup listeners for the remaining gestures. Applications using Touch_events disable the browser handling of gestures by calling preventDefault(), but should also use touch-action to ensure the browser knows the intent of the application before any event listeners have been invoked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，平移（滚动）和收缩手势仅由浏览器处理。使用应用程序 Pointer_events 将获得 pointercancel 当浏览器开始处理触摸手势事件。通过明确指定浏览器应处理的手势，应用程序可以在 pointermove 和 pointerup 侦听器中提供自己的行为。使用 Touch_events 的应用程序可以通过调用 preventDefault() 来禁用浏览器对手势的处理，但是也应该使用 touch-action 来确保浏览器在调用任何事件侦听器之前就知道了应用程序的意图。

trans-unit.source: By default, panning (scrolling) and pinching gestures are handled exclusively by the browser. An application using Pointer events will receive a pointercancel event when the browser starts handling a touch gesture. By explicitly specifying which gestures should be handled by the browser, an application can supply its own behavior in pointermove and pointerup listeners for the remaining gestures. Applications using Touch events disable the browser handling of gestures by calling preventDefault(), but should also use touch-action to ensure the browser knows the intent of the application before any event listeners have been invoked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，平移（滚动）和收缩手势仅由浏览器处理。当浏览器开始处理触摸手势时，使用Pointer事件的应用程序将收到一个 pointercancel 事件。通过显式指定浏览器应处理的手势，应用程序可以在 pointermove 和 pointerup 侦听器中提供其自己的行为。使用Touch事件的应用程序可以通过调用 preventDefault() 来禁用浏览器对手势的处理，但是还应该使用 touch-action 以确保浏览器在调用任何事件侦听器之前就知道应用程序的意图。

trans-unit.source: By default, the different color stops you specify are spaced equidistantly around the circle. You can position the starting angle of the conic gradient using the "from" keyword at the beginning followed by an angle or a length, and you can specify different positions for the colors stops by including an angle or length after them.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,您指定的不同颜色的停止点在圆周上的间距是相等的。你可以使用 "from "关键字来定位圆锥渐变的起始角度,然后再加上一个角度或长度,你也可以在颜色停止点后面加上一个角度或长度来指定它们的不同位置。

trans-unit.source: By default, the gradient transitions evenly from one color to the next. You can include a color-hint to move the midpoint of the transition value to a certain point along the gradient. In this example, we've moved the midpoint of the transition from the 50% mark to the 10% mark.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,渐变从一种颜色均匀地过渡到另一种颜色。你可以包含一个颜色提示,将过渡值的中点沿渐变方向移动到某个点。在这个例子中,我们已经将过渡的中点从50%标记移动到10%标记。

trans-unit.source: By default, the origin of a transform is center.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，变换的原点是 center 。

trans-unit.source: By default, the repeated images are clipped to the size of the element, but they can be scaled to fit (using round) or evenly distributed from end to end (using space).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，重复的图像被裁剪为元素的大小，但是它们可以缩放以适合（使用 round ）或从一端到另一端均匀分布（使用 space ）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the subheadings and paragraphs were laid out rather messily because the headings were not in a uniform place. However, we used break-after: column on the <p> elements to force a column break after each one, meaning that you end up with an <h2> neatly at the top of each column.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，由于标题不在同一位置，因此子标题和段落的布局比较混乱。但是，我们在 <p> 元素上使用了 break-after: column ，以强制在每一列之后都中断一列，这意味着您最终在每一列的顶部都整齐地以 <h2> 结束。

trans-unit.source: By default, the subheadings and paragraphs were laid out rather messily because the headings were not in a uniform place. However, we used break-before: column on the <h2> elements to force a column break before each one, meaning that you end up with an <h2> neatly at the top of each column.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，由于标题不在同一位置，因此子标题和段落的布局比较混乱。但是，我们在 <h2> 元素上使用了 break-before: column ，以强制在每个列之前插入一个分行符，这意味着您在每个列的顶部都整齐地以 <h2> 结尾。

trans-unit.source: By default, the width is set as close as possible to the initial viewport considering the maximum width constraint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,考虑到最大宽度约束,宽度设置为尽可能接近初始视口。

trans-unit.source: By default, when the inner box is scolled and a scroll boundary is reached, the whole page will begin to scroll, which is probably not what we want. To avoid this, you can set overscroll-behavior-x: contain on the inner box:

trans-unit.source: By default, when the inner box is scrolled and a scroll boundary is reached, the whole page will begin to scroll, which is probably not what we want. To avoid this happening in the block direction, we've set overscroll-behavior-block: contain on the inner box.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当滚动内部框并达到滚动边界时，整个页面将开始滚动，这可能不是我们想要的。为了避免在块方向发生这种情况，我们在内部框上设置了 overscroll-behavior-block: contain 。

trans-unit.source: By default, when the inner box is scrolled and a scroll boundary is reached, the whole page will begin to scroll, which is probably not what we want. To avoid this happening in the inline direction, we've set overscroll-behavior-inline: contain on the inner box.

trans-unit.source: By default, zoom-enabled elements can be zoomed by the user via pinch-zoom. The top-level element can also be zoomed via double-tap when it is zoom-enabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,已启用缩放功能的元素可以由用户通过捏住缩放来进行缩放。启用缩放功能后,顶层元素也可以通过双击进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: By modifying the coordinate space, CSS transforms change the shape and position of the affected content without disrupting the normal document flow. This guide provides an introduction to using transforms.
trans-unit.target: 通过修改坐标空间，CSS变换可在不中断正常文档流的情况下更改受影响内容的形状和位置。本指南提供了使用转换的介绍。

trans-unit.source: By setting a margin of auto on one item in a set of flex items all aligned to start, we can create a split navigation. This works well with Flexbox and the alignment properties. As soon as there is no space available for the auto margin, the item behaves in the same way as all the other flex items and shrinks to try to fit into space.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 margin 的 auto 在一组的所有排列进行Flex项目中的一个项目，我们可以创造一个分裂的导航。这与Flexbox和对齐方式属性很好地配合使用。一旦没有足够的空间供自动页边距使用，则该项目的行为与所有其他flex项目相同，并且会收缩以尝试适应空间。

trans-unit.source: By setting a margin of auto on one item in a set of flex items all aligned to start, we can create a split navigation. This works well with Flexbox and the alignment properties. As soon as there is no space available for the auto margin, the item behaves in the same way as all the other flex items and shrinks to try to fit into the space.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 margin 的 auto 在一组的所有排列进行Flex项目中的一个项目，我们可以创造一个分裂的导航。这与Flexbox和对齐方式属性很好地配合使用。一旦没有足够的空间供自动页边距使用，则该项目的行为与所有其他flex项目相同，并且会收缩以尝试适应该空间。

trans-unit.source: By setting its value to ignore, you can disable focusing the element, which means that the user will not be able to activate the element. The element will be skipped in the tab sequence.
trans-unit.target: 通过将其值设置为 ignore ，可以禁用对元素的聚焦，这意味着用户将无法激活该元素。该元素将在选项卡序列中被跳过。

trans-unit.source: By tabbing around any of the live examples on this page, you can see how order is potentially creating a strange experience for anyone not using a pointing device of some kind. To read more about this disconnect of visual order and logical order and some of the potential problems it raises for accessibility, see the following resources.
trans-unit.target: 通过在本页面上的任何一个实时示例中进行分页,你可以看到秩序是如何为不使用某种指向性设备的人创造一种奇怪的体验。要了解更多关于视觉顺序和逻辑顺序的脱节,以及它给无障碍性带来的一些潜在问题,请看以下资源。

trans-unit.source: By using Box Values for Shapes we can wrap our content around the edges defined by these values. In all of the examples below I am using an element which has padding, a border, and a margin defined in order that you can see the different ways in which content will flow.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用形状的方框值,我们可以将我们的内容包裹在由这些值定义的边缘。在下面所有的例子中,我使用了一个有padding、border和margin定义的元素,以便你可以看到内容流动的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: CSS 2.0 defined only computed value as the last step in a property's calculation. Then, CSS 2.1 introduced the distinct definition of used value. An element could then explicitly inherit a width/height of a parent, whose computed value is a percentage. For CSS properties that don't depend on layout (e.g., display, font-size, or line-height), the computed values and used values are the same. The following are the CSS 2.1 properties that do depend on layout, so they have a different computed value and used value: (taken from CSS 2.1 Changes: Specified, computed, and actual values):

trans-unit.source: CSS Animations make it possible to do incredible things with the elements that make up your documents and apps. However, there are things you might want to do that aren't obvious, or clever ways to do things that you might not come up with right away. This article is a collection of tips and tricks we've found that may make your work easier, including how to run a stopped animation again.
trans-unit.target: CSS动画使你可以用组成你的文档和应用程序的元素做一些不可思议的事情。然而,你可能想做一些不明显的事情,或者你可能不会马上想到的巧妙方法。本文是我们发现的技巧和窍门的集合,可能会让你的工作变得更轻松,包括如何再次运行一个停止的动画。

trans-unit.source: CSS Grid Layout and accessibility
trans-unit.target: CSS网格布局和可访问性

trans-unit.source: CSS Grid Layout has been designed to work alongside other parts of CSS, as part of a complete system for doing the layout. In this guide, I will explain how a grid fits together with other techniques you may already be using.
trans-unit.target: CSS Grid Layout被设计成与CSS的其他部分一起工作,作为做布局的完整系统的一部分。在本指南中,我将解释网格如何与你可能已经使用的其他技术结合在一起。

trans-unit.source: CSS Grid Layout implements the specification Box Alignment Level 3 which is the same standard flexbox uses for aligning items in its flex container. This specification details how alignment should work in all the different layout methods. Layout methods will conform to the specification where possible and implement individual behavior based on their differences (features and constraints). While the specification currently specifies alignment details for all layout methods, browsers have not fully implemented all of the specification; however, the CSS Grid Layout method has been widely adopted.
trans-unit.target: CSS Grid Layout实现了规范Box Alignment Level 3，这与标准flexbox用来对齐其flex容器中的项目相同。该规范详细说明了对齐方式应在所有不同的布局方法中如何工作。布局方法将尽可能符合规范，并根据它们的差异（功能和约束）实施单独的行为。虽然规范当前为所有布局方法指定了对齐方式细节，但浏览器尚未完全实现所有规范。但是，CSS Grid Layout方法已被广泛采用。

trans-unit.source: CSS Grid Layout, and the Box Alignment specification are designed to work with writing modes in CSS. This means that if you are working in a right to left language, such as Arabic, the start of the grid would be the top and right, so the default of justify-content: start would be for grid tracks to start on the right hand side of the grid.
trans-unit.target: CSS网格布局和Box Alignment规范旨在与CSS中的书写模式一起使用。这意味着，如果您使用的是从右到左的语言（例如阿拉伯语），则网格的起点将位于顶部和右侧，因此默认的 justify-content: start 将使网格轨迹从右侧开始网格的一侧。

trans-unit.source: CSS Key Concepts: CSS syntax, at-rule, comments, specificity and inheritance, the box, layout modes and visual formatting models, and margin collapsing, or the initial, computed, resolved, specified, used, and actual values. Definitions of value syntax, shorthand properties and replaced elements.
trans-unit.target: CSS关键概念：CSS语法，规则，注释，特异性和继承性，框，布局模式和视觉格式设置模型以及边距折叠，或初始，计算，解析，指定，使用和实际值。值语法的定义，速记属性和替换元素。

trans-unit.source: CSS Level 1
trans-unit.target: CSS 1级

trans-unit.source: CSS Level 1 only included 16 basic colors, called the VGA colors as they were taken from the set of displayable colors on VGA graphics cards.
trans-unit.target: CSS级别1仅包含16种基本颜色，称为VGA颜色，因为它们是从VGA图形卡上的一组可显示颜色中提取的。
